originalText.text: We use Best Pet RX for all our rescue dog prescriptions, and not only is their customer service amazing, their rescue pricing is incredibly competitive. Linda the rescue coordinator is so friendly and helpful. Thankful we found Best Pet RX!

text.text: We use Best Pet RX for all our rescue dog prescriptions, and not only is their customer service amazing, their rescue pricing is incredibly competitive. Linda the rescue coordinator is so friendly and helpful. Thankful we found Best Pet RX!

originalText.text: I have been ordering meds for my dog from this pharmacy monthly for the last 6 months. The techs are always super helpful and I always receive them within 2 days even though I live on the other side of the country. One of the meds is half the price at Best Pet compared to what I paid at a local pharmacy. They even provide me with gloves for handling the chemo drug. I highly recommend Best Pet Rx for their reliability, price, and support

originalText.text: They only have one competent person working there. Prices are INSANE. We have been charged $90+ per month for medication that our vet recommended we get on chewy for $20. Chewy delivered in the same timing (since best pet Rx is always late or delayed) and it was such a better experience

text.text: They only have one competent person working there. Prices are INSANE. We have been charged $90+ per month for medication that our vet recommended we get on chewy for $20. Chewy delivered in the same timing (since best pet Rx is always late or delayed) and it was such a better experience

originalText.text:
Five stars to the pharmacy, customer service, and delivering!!!

One of my medicines for my old animal  was considered pending and I was worried of a major delay because of a holiday weekend. They said they’d resend me a new medication free of charge because they wanted to make sure my pet got his medicine and would NEVER go without his medicine, and they did JUST that!

They were very compassionate and understanding to my problem, and it doesn’t hurt that whenever I call up for a refill they are ALWAYS kind and courteous. 5 stars for the pharmacists as well, they are always happy to answer my questions no matter how weird or obscure!

And yes, I do even recommend this to other animal owners that need the best animal medicine care!

text.text:

They were very compassionate and understanding to my problem, and it doesn’t hurt that whenever I call up for a refill they are ALWAYS kind and courteous. 5 stars for the pharmacists as well, they are always happy to answer my questions no matter how weird or obscure!

And yes, I do even recommend this to other animal owners that need the best animal medicine care!

originalText.text:
My cat Cashmere developed heart issues this past this year and has to take several daily medicines. I tried different pharmacies but I like Best Pet the most.

They compounded the medicine for me  I love that they will give you a different flavor if you call within 5 days. That is an amazing service feature because the medicines are so expensive to compound. Also, Best Pet is the fastest when it comes to deliveries and wait times on the phone are minimal.

I highly recommend them.
